summary: If You Want Something Done Right - InTheShadows - The Avengers (Marvel Movies) [Archive of Our Own]
title: If You Want Something Done Right - InTheShadows - The Avengers (Marvel Movies) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 1/1
Fandom: The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
Relationships: James “Bucky” Barnes & Tony Stark, minor James “Bucky” Barnes & Steve Rogers
Characters: James “Bucky” Barnes, Tony Stark, Avengers Team (MCU)
Additional Tags: Post-Captain America: The Winter Soldier, Teen Tony Stark, Protective Tony Stark, BAMF Tony Stark, Possessive Tony Stark, HYDRA programming, brainwashing recovery, Bucky Barnes’s Trigger Words, Gen or Pre-Slash
Summary:

The Asset is lost.
The Shadow heard those words and instantly knew something had went very wrong with the last mission. He also knew just what he was going to do. He was going to go get his Asset back and no one was going to stop him. Not the Avengers and certainly not HYDRA. No one was going to stop him from fulfilling his mission, not anymore.
